Package de.lessvoid.nifty.effects

Interface Summary
EffectImpl Effect Implementation ... here is the actual fun :>
 

Class Summary
Effect An effect can be active or not and is always attached to one element.
EffectEvents  
EffectManager manage all effects of an element.
EffectProcessor An EffectProcessor handles a single effect type.
Falloff The Falloff class.
NiftyRenderDeviceProxy RenderDeviceProxy.
 

Enum Summary
EffectEventId possible effect event id's that you can attach effects too.
EffectType EffectType: pre or post effect.
Falloff.HoverFalloffConstraint falloff constraint.
Falloff.HoverFalloffType falloff type.
